summary: Provides Home Assistant integration for Xiaomi Miio smart plugs and power strips, defining switch entities that manage power state, report consumption and device attributes, and expose services to adjust power mode, pricing, and Wi‑Fi LED settings.
business_intent: Allow Home Assistant users to control, monitor, and configure Xiaomi Wi‑Fi sockets and power strips within their smart home automations, enabling on/off control, energy tracking, and feature customization.
